page.title: 09 St Minver Cricket Club
page.content: St Minver Cricket Club started in the year{1892.}It is a private ground and with an area of just over{2 hectares. It lies just behind the{Perceval {Institute.}Before it was used as a cricket field it was just an ordinary farm field.The Village Squire who lived in{St Minver House}formed the Cricket Club.The club committee maintain the ground. Altogether there are four teams.Two teams play on Saturday ,another team plays on week days.The other team is an under 21 team which plays in knockout contests. The youngest player is{14}years old. The oldest player is{53}years old.The team have won the league three times. One of those years was in 1975.Holiday makers often join the St Minver teams.At the{clubhouse}which operates year round there is a{bar}with a pool table,darts and two fruit machines.
